original_text: But Jonah did not want to obey the Lord's command. He decided to run away to Tarshish. He went down to Joppa. There he found a ship that was ready to sail to Tarshish. After he had paid for the journey, he got into the ship. He wanted to go on the ship to Tarshish, to get far away from the Lord.
korean_text: 그러나 요나가 여호와의 얼굴을 피하려고 일어나 다시스로 도망하려 하여 욥바로 내려갔더니 마침 다시스로 가는 배를 만난지라 여호와의 얼굴을 피하여 그들과 함께 다시스로 가려고 배삯을 주고 배에 올랐더라

sentences.original_text: But Jonah did not want to obey the Lord's command.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 요나는 주님의 명령에 순종하고 싶지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: He decided to run away to Tarshish.

sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 그는 배 한 척을 발견했습니다.

sentences.original_text: that was ready to sail to Tarshish.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 배는 다시스로 항해할 준비가 되어 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: After he had paid for the journey,
He wanted to go on the ship to Tarshish,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다시스로 가는 배를 타고 싶었고,

sentences.original_text: to get far away from the Lord.
